reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, soft, and comfortable, with a true-to-size fit that falls just above the knee. However, several customers mention it is see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute Dress!
items.body: I haven't worn or washed it yet but so far I love it. I tried it on and it fits well. I usually run between sizes and I sized up for this dress. It is so soft. Some of the reviews say that it is thin. It is, but I couldn't tell that its see-through as some of the reviews state. I ordered the red one for a holiday party and I'm super excited to wear it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars wear something underneath
items.body: somewhat see-through but super nice otherwise received a lot of compliments on it Read more
items.author: Tofarinluv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable
items.body: Comfortable fit, true to size. Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cute
items.body: Love this dress. Fits great, soft and looks as advertised. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable and soft. Love it
items.body: I love this and have ordered it in two colors. Read more
items.author: S. Stevens

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Comfy, and Surprisingly Cute
items.body: I did not have high expectations when I ordered this dress because sometimes sweater dresses can be a little hit or miss. But this one showed up and instantly felt like the kind of easy outfit you throw on and somehow look put together without even trying. The fabric feels fine, soft enough to be cozy but not too thick or heavy. It drapes nicely and has that little bit of stretch that makes you want to wear it all day. The fit was just right too, not clingy but not shapeless either. It falls at the knee in a way that feels relaxed but still flattering. And the pockets, oh the pockets, I love when a dress actually gives you somewhere to stick your hands or your phone instead of pretending to be practical. I wore it around the house at first just to see how it felt and then ended up keeping it on to run errands because it just worked. It looks good with boots, sneakers, or even slippers if we are being honest. Nothing fancy, nothing fussy, just one of those solid finds that makes you feel like you somehow won the online shopping game for the day. Read more
items.author: Robert and Julie Ser

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fall dresses
items.body: I love the material of the dress, very comfortable, the sizes are true to size Read more
items.author: Maria Haliton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not for me
items.body: The dress was really cute and quality was good. Material was soft and liked that it had pockets. Unfortunately on my body it did not work. I have a round tummy and I just looked pregnant so I will be returning. Read more
items.author: Justin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Blue, Burgundy, Apricot, Black, Green, Maple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
